General.Name: Beijing InterAct Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Interact Technology Co.,Ltd. provides marketing information solutions in China. It offers contact center, unified communications, marketing business and management platforms, media services and operation platforms, and related technical services. The company's solutions support the users in formulating marketing strategies, completing marketing planning, and marketing execution and control activities, as well as customer behavior and value sharing, customer relationship, experience and performance management, decision support, and other functions. It serves banking, insurance, manufacturing, commercial circulation and services, hotel, content service, and other industries, as well as government and public utilities. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Block A, Raycom Creative Center Building, Beijing, China, 100043

AddressData.Street: Block A, Raycom Creative Center Building
